document_data.name: The Testers
document_data.mainbody: The '''Testers''' were a fanatical and radical band of [[Tymora]]n [[priest]]s who took extreme risks to spread the glory of their goddess, believing that testing their luck proved their love and trust for Tymora. Given the choice between a safe approach and one with little margin for error, they would rely on the flashier but more difficult approach.{{Cite dragon/388/Channel Divinity: Tymora}}
document_data.Relationships: Fellow Tymorans who did not subscribe to the radical notions of the Testers still supported them by healing or raising those who tested their luck and found it wanting.
